selected_quotes: Australia displays the hallmarks of an ‘ethnocracy’ but carries itself in the rhetoric of multiculturalism.
Learning new words today: Australia as ethnocracy (that I never knew this word is actually a surprise)
“Australia displays many of the hallmarks of such an ethnocracy … cloaked in rhetoric of multiculturalism.”
Interesting article by one of our authors: First the word, then the deed: how an #ethnocracy like Australia works

citation.abstract: Australia was designed at Federation to ensure nationals of British descent would be able to create a society populated by individuals as much like themselves as possible.
citation.title: First the word, then the deed: how an 'ethnocracy' like Australia works
